MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repairs on our overhead line network near to Borthwick Brae , we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:45PM. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:12 PM on Wednesday, 03 February 2021.
